BatchAccountBaseProperties.description: The properties of a Batch account.

location.description: The region in which to create the account.

tags.description: The user specified tags associated with the account.

BatchAccountCreateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create operation.

storageAccountId.description: The resource ID of the storage account to be used for auto storage account.

lastKeySync.description: The UTC time at which storage keys were last synchronized with the Batch account.

accountEndpoint.description: The endpoint used by this account to interact with the Batch services.

provisioningState.description: The provisioned state of the resource

activeJobAndJobScheduleQuota.description: The active job and job schedule quota for this Batch account.
